[[module CSS]]

/* 假标签 */
#main-content .page-tags {
display:none;
}

div.pseudo-tags ul {
    font-size: 85%;
    border-top: 1px solid #BBB;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 10px 0 0;
    padding: 0 2px;
    list-style: none;
}
 
div.pseudo-tags li {
    color: #308014;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0 1px;
    cursor: pointer;
}

[[/module]]
